Text.Value: What are you -

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Player tilt up head and swallow stone
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player tilts their head back and drops the stone in. The Emperor looks disconcerted by this.

Text.Value: *Life pulses from within - the parasite's thoughts whisper at the edge of your mind.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Astral-touched tadpole out of inventory and looks at it.
EditorData.VFXTags: Tadpole stone glowing to show it has life in it

Text.Value: *If you let it, it will evolve you, just as the Emperor said.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ChristianD] PLYR picks the tadpole up from the ground.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player picks up tadpole from the ground. (We don't need to see contact.)

Text.Value: Commune with it. You'll see - it only wants to help you.
Wait! Remember - it has enough vitality to nourish you and your allies.

EditorData.AnimationTags: The player is shocked by the emperor voice and drops down in surprise. Looking around the area a bit before settling on the tadpole on the ground

Text.Value: But if you had opened your mind to it rather than consuming it, your allies could have taken advantage of its power as well.
Reconsider - let the tadpole in.
Ignore the Emperor - proceed to stomp on the tadpole.
Now is the time. It wants to evolve you. Don't be afraid - the transformation will only be partial, and you will benefit from it greatly.

EditorData.NodeContext: a pause mid-combat, so the line should be urgent, but confident

Text.Value: I suppose if it works...
*You feel different - powerful. Your strength and intellect enhanced. Your mind braced to survive.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: The transformation is over, the player is then on their knees. They gets up and opend their eyes amd looking at their body beforegoing into battle stance
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player quickly looks over their new form, before bracing to rejoin combat.

Text.Value: Go on. Don't be afraid. It only wants to help you evolve.
Drop it on the ground and crush it.
*Your thoughts swirl with possibility - your body strengthened, your mind bolstered, your very self expanded. All within your reach if you open your mind to the parasite.*
*The stone is cold - the parasite within is unresponsive. It has nothing more to give you.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Astral-touched tadpole out of inventory and looks at it.

Text.Value: *It wants to share itself with you - it wants to be let in.*
*It's just a rock, shaped like a parasite. It has nothing to offer you.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Astral-touched tadpole out of inventory and looks at it.
The player stomps the astral-touched tadpole into pieces.
EditorData.SFXTags: Stomping on the stone with the stone crushing beneath the heel SFX

Text.Value: Let the tadpole transform you.
Probe at the tadpole's intentions.
Eat the tadpole.
Disappointing. You have lowered our chances of success with your actions.
Perhaps once the others see what you can do, they will consider trying it for themselves.
Put it away - out of sight, out of mind.
*As you tuck the tadpole away, you feel a fleeting disappointment. It wanted so desperately to commune with you.*
*The tadpole prickles with excitement, its thoughts rampant and chaotic in its rush to communicate with you. It is impossible to discern any single intention.*

EditorData.VFXTags: Mind meld effect on the player while the tadpole glows

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ChristianD] PLYR drops the tadpole to the ground in front of them, , [ChristianD] *REUSE* [Player] HUM_M_Rig_DFLT_SCENE_FOR_PriestsOfTheConqueringGod_Tadpole_Player_StompsTadpole, ,
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player drops the tadpole on the ground in anticipation of stomping on it.
EditorData.SFXTags: The tadpole stone drop on floor
EditorData.logicalname: Player drops tadpole on the ground

Text.Value: *You feel... different. Your body has never felt more connected. Your mind present in every flex of a joint or muscle.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: The transformation is over, the player is then on their knees. They gets up and opend their eyes amd looking at their body before looking back at the emperor
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The transformation is over. The player opens their eyes and takes in the change in their skin with surprise, but not displeasure.
EditorData.VFXTags: The player transformed into a partial-illithid with veins lighthing up all over the body

Text.Value: *The tadpole's essence courses through you - where it touches, your flesh, glands, organs contract and flood with pure thought.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: The player is then transform in to part-illthid. They then look at their body during transformation and noted the changes happening to their body. Might able to reuse animation from  INT_EmperorRevealed_AfterOrpheus
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Same as in INT_EmperorRevealed_AfterOrpheus, but location-agnostic. 

The player transforms into a partial-illithid. Veins light up under the skin as the transformation makes its way around their body. They observe their own body parts as it works its way around.
EditorData.SFXTags: The player transforms into a partial-illithid. Veins light up under the skin as the transformation makes its way around their body
EditorData.VFXTags: The player transforms into a partial-illithid. Veins light up under the skin as the transformation makes its way around their body

Text.Value: *The tadpole screams for growth with painful intensity. It has been starved - of life, of purpose. It welcomes your probing like a void waiting to be filled.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ChristianD] PLYR mindmeld with tadpole on his hand
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A mindmeldy effect over next few nodes
EditorData.VFXTags: Mind meld effect on the player while the tadpole glows

Text.Value: *A coldness seeps through your veins as the tadpole awakens, its yearning almost unbearable. Your mind is a veritable feast.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: The player notice the stone extruding power, the player flinch back a bit when notice this. After a while the player finds their resove and grip the tadpole tightly in to their fist
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the inert stone that contains the astral-touched tadpole glowing with life at its core.
EditorData.VFXTags: Tadpole stone glowing to show it has life in it

Text.Value: Put the tadpole away - you don't need it right now.
Open your mind to it.

Synopsis: The player uses the Astral-touched tadpole from their inventory and transforms into a partial-illithid.
